titleStmt.title: True newes of a notable victorie obtayned against the Turkes, by the right honourable Lorde, Adolph Baron of Swartzburg, the 18. day of March last past, anno 1598 vvhen as he and his armie three houres before day, came before Raab, and tooke in that strong and well fenced hold and cittie / translated out of the high Dutch coppy ; printed first at Nurnbergh &c. ; by W.S.R.
titleStmt.author: W. S. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I.R. for Richard Oliue, and are to be sold at his shop in Long-lane, at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Pagination starts with 5 on third page of item.
T.p. contains portrait of Lord Adolph.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Long-lane, at the signe of the Bible
